```py
import sys
from PyQt5 import QtWidgets as qtw
from PyQt5 import QtGui as qtg
from PyQt5 import QtCore as qtc
```

```py
class MainWindow(qtw.QWidget):

    def __init__(self):
        """MainWindow constructor"""
        super().__init__()

```

```py
if __name__ == '__main__':
    app = qtw.QApplication(sys.argv)
    mw = MainWindow()
    sys.exit(app.exec())
```
